Passive.Name: The Fun Gang
Passive.Description: When On The Same Team With Ralsei And Susie, Kris will deal +50% Damage

Passive.Name: Dark Lancer Fan Club
Passive.Description: When On The Same Team With Lancer, Susie will deal +25% Damage

Passive.Name: Range Boost
Passive.Description: All Towers In Range Of This Unit Are Given A +15% Range Boost (30% If Shiny)

Passive.Name: Range Boost
Passive.Description: Every 10s Lancer Summons a clone of his bike that deals 500 damage every 0.25 seconds (Max 5 On Field), dealing 1000 damage on death

Passive.Name: Snowgrave
Passive.Description: Every 30s Noelle will stun all enemies in her range for 2.5 seconds, dealing x5 damage to each enemy

Passive.Name: Shopkeeper
Passive.Description: All Towers In Range Of Seam are Given a +50% Cash Boost, Seam will also generate 1500 cash every wave.

Passive.Name: Go forth!! My Squeakie Duckie!!
Passive.Description: Every 30s Rouxls Kaard will explode a random enemy with his thrash machine, instakilling it and dealing 2500 damage to all enemies near the explosion

Passive.Name: Dance Party
Passive.Description: Every 15s Sweet Cap'n Cakes will throw a dance party, stunning all enemies in range for 2.5s

Passive.Name: [[Number 1 Rated Salesman1997]]
Passive.Description: Every 19.97 seconds, spamton will steal a [[HeartShapedObject]] from an enemy, dealing 199700 damage to it.

Passive.Name: Queen's Mansion
Passive.Description: Swatch Gives All Towers In Range A +25% Damage Boost, and Generates 10000 Cash Every Wave.

Passive.Name: Hug
Passive.Description: Hugs enemies dealing 1000 damage every 1.5 seconds, and slowing them by 25% for 2 seconds

Passive.Name: Order! Order!
Passive.Description: Attacks Stun Enemies for 0.5 Seconds, chaining up to 15 nearby enemies.

Passive.Name: Two heads are better than one! Three... maybe not.
Passive.Description: Attacks Hit 3 times.

Passive.Name: Controlled
Passive.Description: Every 10s Werewire will place a trap that deals x5 their damage to the first enemy that steps on it, and stuns them for 1.25 seconds. (Max 25 Traps On Field)

Passive.Name: Computer Virus
Passive.Description: All Towers In Range Of This Unit Are Given A +10% Damage Boost (20% If Shiny), and Enemies In Range Are Given 5% Wither (10% If Shiny)

Passive.Name: Aggressive Anti-Virus
Passive.Description: Enemies Hit by Ambyu-Lance are given 22% Slow (45% If Shiny)

Passive.Name: Criminal Virus
Passive.Description: Attacks Apply 15% Slow

Passive.Name: meowowow meowowow
Passive.Description: Enemies Hit by Tasque are given 5% Wither.

Passive.Name: Warmify
Passive.Description: Swatchling Deals 50% Burn Damage Over 3 Seconds, 100% Burn Damage If Swatch Is On The Same Team.

Passive.Name: Lost Wire
Passive.Description: Attacks Chain Up to 5 Nearby Enemies, giving them 50% Slow for 2.5 seconds.

Passive.Name: Metaphysical Challenge
Passive.Description: Every 15s, Picks The Strongest Enemy In Tenna's range And Traps Them In A Ball Stunning Them For 5s, And Dealing x10 Damage To Them

Passive.Name: What If Things Got Darker Than Dark?
Passive.Description: All Enemys In Range Are Given 75% Slow And 50% Anti-Regen
